physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Muscle weakness and hypotonia of extremities, muscle weakness of neck flexion (MRC grade 4), elbow flexion (MRC grade 3), and knee extension (MRC grade 4). No tendon reflexes of the biceps brachii and triceps were found. No significant abnormalities were observed in cranial nerve examination, sensory system, autonomic nervous system, and meningeal irritation sign.
